channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why The Old Way Of Buying Services Won’t Work For AI
item.description: There is nothing more difficult, nothing more dangerous, than introducing a new order of things. And that’s exactly what AI is doing.

item.title: Ray Dalio is guided by gratitude: Why CEOs need to find their codifying principles
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Google’s Ruth Porat: To unlock AI’s upside, rethink every process
item.description: "I think we are living in an extraordinary time," Porat said at the Fortune Global Forum.

item.title: Amazon to cut around 14K corporate jobs
item.description: Amazon will eliminate 14,000 corporate positions through internal restructuring, joining over 200 tech companies that cut 98,000 jobs this year.

item.title: Bill Gates says a ‘doomsday outlook’ on climate is driving people to focus on the wrong things
item.description: "If given a choice between eradicating malaria and a tenth of a degree increase in warming, I'll let the temperature go up," Gates said.

item.title: Chegg’s CEO once said he’s the ‘poster child’ for AI shock. Now, the company is slashing 45% of staff
item.description: The edtech pioneer cuts 388 jobs and brings back Dan Rosensweig as CEO, underscoring how generative AI and shrinking Google traffic are reshaping stud...

item.title: Insta360 X4 Air Is A Lighter, More Affordable 360-Degree Action Camera
item.description: The Insta360 X4 Air looks a lot like its popular X-series 360-degree camera siblings but is lighter, and costs less than the flagship Insta360 X5.

item.title: NYT Connections: Today’s Answers Explained (Wednesday, October 29, #871)
item.description: Not sure what today's NYT Connections answers are all about? Find out just what the different words in today's grid mean and how they fit together.

item.title: ‘Are you crazy?’ ‘A little…’ Inside one obsessed U.S. Agent’s $50 million secret plot to capture Nicolás Maduro by turning his pilot against him
item.description: Armed with a $50 million bounty and a rogue plan, a Homeland Security agent tried to flip Maduro’s personal pilot into delivering Venezuela’s presiden...

item.title: Gmail Passwords Confirmed Within 183 Million Account Infostealer Leak
item.description: As news of 183 million credentials from infostealer logs being leaked spreads, Gmail users have been confirmed as caught firmly in the crosshairs.

item.title: AI And Fitness Tracking Can Help Us Live Longer
item.description: AI-enhanced tracking reinforces simple truth: regular movement and muscle-building drive healthy longevity more than trendy therapies.

item.title: U.S. labor market has remained in expansion mode this month: ADP
UPS shares are surging in premarket trades following earnings report
U.S. stock indexes push to all-time highs as Fed convenes two-day policy meeting
What stock-market history says about prospects after indexes notch record highs
Microsoft gains an edge vs. Apple in race to join Nvidia in the $4 trillion club
The Fed 5: Bessent's short list for Powell's job
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's term ends in May 2026, but that isn't stopping Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent from moving ahead with finding h...

item.title: Federal Reserve faces dilemma amid expected rate cut decision
item.description: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates 25-basis-points at its meeting this week, though elevated inflation has created a dilemma for po...

item.title: Inflation remained well above the Fed's target in September ahead of rate cut decision
item.description: Inflation remained elevated in September as the BLS released the delayed consumer price index inflation report, as Fed policymakers are set to weigh i...

item.title: Social Security COLA for 2026 revealed following shutdown-related delay
item.description: The Social Security Administration revealed its annual cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) for 2026, which is going to boost benefits by 2.8% next year t...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
